org.apache.fontbox.cff

Class CFFDataInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fontbox.cff.DataInput
      • org.apache.fontbox.cff.CFFDataInput

  • public class CFFDataInput
extends DataInput
    This is specialized DataInput. It's used to parse a CFFFont.
